name: IGD Halloween Game Jam
description:
Use your necromancy magic to defeat the enemies. You can ressurect skeletons and equip them with bows or swords, and you can cast fireballs at your enemies! Can you last long enough to breach the castle? (Spoiler: you cannot, just survive for as long as you can).

Controls
 - WASD to move around

 - Click and Drag Left Mouse Button to cast spells

This game was made with Rust programming language from scratch using a simple engine.
